snippet.title: Blades of Brim - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The creators of Subway Surfers present Blades of Brim!
Brim needs YOU! Brim is under siege by invading underling Goons. Are you the champion they've been waiting for?
Step into an epic and enchanting universe where magic and mayhem await!

• Battle - Protect your epic kingdom!
• Level Up - Work it, make it, do it!
• Heroes - Super slayers, awesome allies!
• Boosts - Wicked weapons, potent power ups!
• Armor - Slick shields and battlegear!
• Pets - Mystical mounts, dragons and wolves of war!
• Fast paced - Hardcore, high speed hit-combos!
• Portals - Mysterious gateways to fantastic worlds!
• Compete - Conquer Brim alone or against friends to be the stuff of legend...

Start your journey now and make history!

Download the game here: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id891278325

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BladesofBrim
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/bladesofbrim
